name: Can Alkan
content: Can ALKAN - calkan - Can Alkan, Ph.D. Associate Professor @ Dept. of Computer Engineering, Bilkent University PI, Lab for Bioinformatics & Computational Genomics Department of Computer Engineering Bilkent University Engineering Building, EA-509 Bilkent, Ankara 06800 Turkey Email: : @calkan_cs, @BilkentCompGen : @calkan_cs Note: I don't use phones. Email me instead. Motivated graduate students wanted. Fill this form if you are interested in algorithm design for computational genomics. Fill this form for projects for undergraduate students and summer interns or check out the CS490 web page. Pronunciation of my name: Vita: PDF Public calendar Education Postdoctoral Fellow, Genome Sciences at University of Washington, Seattle, WA, USA, October 2005 to December 2011 Supervisor: Prof. Evan E. Eichler Ph.D.,  Computer Science, at Case Western Reserve University, Cleveland, OH, USA, August 2005 Supervisor: Prof. Cenk Åahinalp B.Sc.,  Computer Science, Bilkent University, Ankara, Turkey, May 2000 Research Interests I am a combinatorial algorithmicist who likes 4-letter alphabets. I work on: Combinatorial algorithm design for bioinformatics: High throughput sequencing data analysis: mapping, alignment, structural variation discovery Pangenomics Hardware acceleration of bioinformatics applications GPGPU Processing-in-memory technologies Visit my research group's web page for more details. Service Department Coordinator  (with AyÅegÃ¼l DÃ¼ndar) - Erasmus and Bilateral Exchange Program Please inspect the web page, including FAQ and application procedure before contacting for questions.
